column4: I thought it would be fun trying a new OS, but linux man is a pain. Nothing works right.
Guys ya'll dont have to flame me lol. I know it has potential. But you have to configure everything or know 100 commands to get stuff working.
I finally got hdmi to tv sound working and then i updated all updates and it deleted my nvidia I installed my new alsa drivers Im like oh wow
you might want to look at the mouse settings in /etc/X11/xorg.conf... maybe something weird got in there about scroll
Im in looking at the xorg.conf now it shows mouse, but nothing about scroll..
you know kde allows for different wallpapers for each workspace
Yeah I just googled that.. Sux gnome doesn't though..
ya it does suck you know... i wonder if its even on their radar... kde has done that forever
I wonder why gnome can't if kde can, structurely isn't it about the same shit just different overlay?
you know i bet it could be added in easy... just nobodys done it yet... you want to try?
Dood I downloaded linux last night, Im not the one to try to figure that one out hehhe
haha ok pal but put it on your to do list ok... i want that feature!
LOL okay
I bet willis__ could do it LOL, willis__ you up for it?
d00d you scared him outta the room... that or you motivated him and hes on the case
LOL
we will find out next release
when is the next release going to be released?
im not too sure... i think they do them 6 months now so around april?
ahhh okay
yah good guess dood
its probably been april and october since 2004 or whatever
